name: Drive101
description:
In this game, your mission is simply to drive, but in a rather unusual terrain. The rules are simple, you have to try not to fall down, turn around or get stuck. If you fail, you will be returned to the last checkpoint. Try to drive as far as possible, this is just the beginning of a long and exciting ride.

MINIMUM SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS

  • CPU: Intel Core2
  • GPU: GeForce GT 210 or HD 3000
  • RAM: 4GB 
  • 160 MB free hard drive space

Controls
W - Forward
S - Brake
D - Right
A - Left
Space - Handbrake (Try to use it a lot)
Backspace - Reset to last Checkpoint

This game is made by Đorđe Aničić
